import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { updateDisplay } from './actions/display' export default function DrumPad() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const audioFiles = useSelector(state => state.audioFiles); function handlePadClick(event) { const elem = document.getElementById(event.target.id + 'audio'); elem.currentTime = 0; elem.play(); dispatch(updateDisplay(event.target.id)) setTimeout(() => dispatch(updateDisplay('PLAY A BEAT...')), 2000) } function handleKeyPress(event) { console.log(event) if(event.key === "q") { const elem = document.getElementById('testAudio'); elem.currentTime = 0; elem.play(); } } return (
) }
